current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require issuers of long term care insurance to
		  establish third-party review processes for disputed claims.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Health, Education, Labor,
			 and Pensions

short-title.#text:
Long Term Care Insurance Integrity
			 Act of 2013

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

header.#text:
Long term care
			 insurance dispute resolution review process

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any other provision of law, an insurance
			 issuer that offers a long term care insurance plan shall develop and implement
			 claims dispute resolution procedures that comply with the requirements of this
			 section that shall be applicable to such plan.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Long Term Care Insurance Integrity Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

text.#text:
A
			 claims dispute resolution procedure under

with respect to
			 such disputes, provide for the application of one or more alternative means of
			 dispute resolution involving independent third-party review under appropriate
			 circumstances by entities that are mutually acceptable to the issuer and the
			 enrollee involved, with the decision of such reviewer being binding on the
			 issuer; and

ensure that an
			 enrollee is eligible to obtain claims review only to the extent and in the
			 manner provided for in the applicable insurance contract.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to an appropriate State court as provided for under State law.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Long Term Care Insurance Integrity Act of 2013/s:2/ss:b/p:2

text.#text:
An
			 enrollee may appeal the decision of an independent reviewer under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to modify the terms of any long term care insurance contract.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Long Term Care Insurance Integrity Act of 2013/s:2/ss:b/p:2

text.#text:
Nothing in this section shall be construed to
			 provide authority for an independent third-party reviewer under

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1481 IS: Long Term Care Insurance Integrity Act of 2013
